aic2024.user

Class GameConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • aic2024.user.GameConstants

  • public class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all constants used in the game.

      • CARE_PACKAGE_PROBABILITIES

        public static final float[] CARE_PACKAGE_PROBABILITIES
        Probabilities of dropping a care package on a given land tile. The i-th position of the array contains the probability of the i-th type of package, sorted by the CarePackage enum.
